# Keil < Kerb ⇔ scrape ⇔ mace

𒈮 𓍊 𓍛 𓍐 𓌂 𓌉 𓌑 𓌃

𐠊 ka < 𒾣 ka < 𐀏 ka < 𐘾 KA <> 𒾥 ≈ 𐙛•SI 𐀯 si 𐠪 si sword 𒾤 ≈ 𐃉 𐘢 PI pugnale 𓃀 𓎼 𓇓 𓅱 𓌑 dagger

𐘸 𐀑 𐚠 𐘹 𐛗 𐃉 𐃋 𐙢 Keil series 𐀑 𐚠 𐜧 𐜨 𐜩 𐜪 𐜫 𐘸 KI 𐀑 ki

𒁹 #ikkillu Keilerei "lamentation; clamor, uproar" 𒀸 makkaš₂ mace

𓈔 Keil 𓄹 ⇔ Beil 𓃀 𓈔
